title: conferred on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) 

(Amendment) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 10 March 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited immigration act 2004 (visas) (amendment) order 2025 (2) order come operation 10 march 2025

title: conferred on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as
heading: 2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is
text_raw:
2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is 

amended – 

(a) 

and 

in Schedule 1, by the deletion of “Eswatini”, “Lesotho”, and 
“Nauru”. 

(b) 

in Schedule 5, by the insertion of – 

(i) 

“Eswatini” after “Eritrea”, 

(ii) 

“Lesotho” after “Lebanon”, and 

(iii) “Nauru” after “Moldova”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 March, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 11th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [68] 3
